data.text:
Demented Promotions Presents:

ROLO TOMASSI (UK)

Hassle Records

(http://www.myspace.com/rolotomassi)

"What is there to say about this band? They simply defy description, but we'll give it a go - there's elements of punk, hardcore, post-rock, electronica, jazz and full on metal. It's an aural assault, but of the hippest kind, and in frontwoman Eva, they posess the most natural star to emerge from the UK underground in years. Catch the band on tour in Ireland in February 2010.

Rolo Tomassi are:

Edward Dutton (drums)

Joe Nicholson (guitar)

Eva Spence (vocals)

James Spence (keys)

Joseph Thorpe (bass) "

---------------------

With support from:

Wounds

(http://www.myspace.com/thewoundsband)

Bats

(http://www.myspace.com/leatherbeatsfeather)

Date: Saturday, 5th February

Place: The Twisted Pepper, Middle Abbey Street

Time: 8.00pm

Price: €12 on the door! Tickets available for €10 (NO booking fee), information below.

Ticket info: Tickets are available now from http://dementedpromotions.bigcartel.com/.
